channel.title: Is the US going to shit?
channel.description:
Just reading through reddit, I'm getting the feeling that the US is breaking down into a police state / dictatorship. I'll include a list of articles that just seem to show the US is getting really fucked up.
[url=http://alternet.org/rights/65406/]When crack cocaine possession means 24 years in prison and manslaughter means only 3, you know something is seriously wrong with the U.S. criminal justice system.[/url]
[url=http://www.nytimes.com/2007/10/17/washington/17cnd-prexy.html?_r=1&hp&oref=slogin]Bush threatens "World War III" if Iran pursues a nuclear weapon. He has officially lost his damn mind.[/url]
[url=http://www.pollsb.com/polls/poll/2984/bush-appoints-anti-contraception-activist-susan-orr-to-head-us-birth-control-program]Bush appoints anti-contraception activist, Susan Orr, to head US birth control program[/url]

These are only the headlines right now. Blackwater, internal corruption, police brutality, faggoty moves by Bush... all that is commonplace in the US nowadays.
